headline: Cognizant Launches Stores 360 to Transform Retail Operations in Collaboration with ServiceNow
summary: Cognizant Stores 360 aims to unify the retail ecosystem and elevate customer experiences through integrated, automated and predictive capabilities, powered by ServiceNow.TEANECK, N.J., Jan. 13, 2025...

headline: Cognizant CEO Ravi Kumar S Honored with Prestigious Pravasi Bharatiya Samman Award
